class Example 
{ 
    int[] field = new int[10];
    void main() 
    { 
        int y;
        while (y == 0)
        {
            if (y != 1)
            {
                foo(y);
                return 3;
            }
            else
            {
                if (i == 'x')
                {
                    i = System.in.int();
                    System.out(i);
                }
                else
                {
                    z = 'é';
                    y = 4 + 5 / 5 % 4 + 3 - 223428;
                    x = a[3 * 4 + 5];
                }
            }
        }
    } 

    int foo(int x)
    {
